post.body: i need help with tweet keys for my blackberry i cant seem to get it to work (question #100)

So far I'm in good spirits this rainy, chilly n. y. Morning will it last thru out ? Tune in!!!
Ahh... corey hart & never surrender... What a song ...unbelievable, its been a while since I heard it !
Good mornin just gettin goin here 2day
I just got up from a cat nap. Which isn't like me at all since its 9:15 p.m. Here in ny
Eagles vs. Browns tonite on monday night football. Me personally I like the eagles to win. Game starts at 8:15
Sometimes tv can be annoying
I'm goin to get some dinner,in the mood for a nice ham&cheese hero with l,t,&mayo yeah that's it
I like this deal or no deal when they go faster makes it way exciting!!
Man is it me or is this day just flyin?
my brother is a real pest
it is beautiful out man !
just finished havin a bagel with cream cheese for lunch ,just havin 1 of them days dont no what to do ,where to go u no the deal!!!!
i dont no what to do for lunch
Just gettin up
gonna watch the giants & cowboys game
can any body help me withgettin twitter keys to work on my blackberry curve
